oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on diffeomorphisms symmetry of $f(R)$ gravity in the cosmological context
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ghalee, Amir
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: General Relativity and Quantum Cosmology
Astrophysics - Cosmology and Nongalactic Astrophysics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the metric perturbations in the context of restricted $f(R)$ gravity, in which a parameter for deviation from the full diffeomorphisms of space-time is introduced. We demonstrate that one can choose the parameter to remove the induced anisotropic stress, which is present in the usual $f(R)$ gravity. Moreover, to prevent instability for the vector and tensor metric perturbations, some constraints on the model are obtained.
